function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Assuming zero latent period for COVID-19 infectiousness","Impact":"Underestimation of disease spread and delayed intervention","Mitigation":"Incorporate latent period in disease models, improve accuracy of outbreak projections","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling software","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Minor potential impact of SEIR dynamics on coefficients recovered by empirical approach","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of outbreak growth and policy impact","Mitigation":"Validate empirical approach with SEIR dynamics, consider the implications of SEIR models in outbreak analysis","Technologies":"Statistical modeling tools, simulation software","People":"Epidemiologists, statisticians, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Use of simulated data to test statistical model accuracy","Impact":"Over-reliance on simulated data for real-world projections","Mitigation":"Validate statistical model accuracy with real-world data, adjust for discrepancies between simulated and real-world conditions","Technologies":"Statistical modeling tools, data validation software","People":"Data scientists, statisticians, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysis teams"}]}
